AboutSection.title: Who We Are
AboutSection.subtitle: Pioneering sustainable energy solutions in Bolivia with innovative technology and strategic partnerships

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At Green Bolivia, we work alongside businesses and communities to develop innovative projects that protect the environment and improve quality of life by offering practical and responsible energy solutions.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be a key ally in the journey towards greener development, leading the renewable energy revolution in Bolivia and setting new standards for sustainable practices.

partnership.title: Exclusive Representatives of JINSUN in Bolivia
partnership.description: We're proud to be the official representatives of JINSUN, one of China's leading manufacturers of renewable energy technologies, bringing cutting-edge solutions to the Bolivian market.

benefits.benefit1: Direct access to the latest BIPV (Building Integrated Photovoltaics) technology
benefits.benefit2: Quality assurance with factory-direct products and technical support
benefits.benefit3: Exclusive distribution rights for innovative solar solutions in Bolivia

signing.caption: Formalizing our exclusive partnership with JINSUN

representatives.caption: JINSUN and Green Bolivia representatives with renewable energy model

ceremony.alt: Group photo of all attendees at the signing ceremony
ceremony.caption: Celebrating our strategic alliance for a sustainable Bolivia

cta.title: Join the Green Energy Revolution
cta.description: Discover how our exclusive BIPV technology can transform your home, office, or building into an energy-generating asset with style and efficiency.

FutureEnergySection.header: Innovative Energy Solutions for the Future
FutureEnergySection.description: Discover how our solutions are revolutionizing the way we interact with energy

solution1.title: Generate Your Own Energy
solution1.subtitle: Reduce Energy Bills
solution1.description: With our solar, wind, and BIPV solutions, you can generate your own electricity anywhere and significantly reduce your energy bill costs.

solution2.title: Clean Energy
solution2.subtitle: Contribute to Environmental Care
solution2.description: By choosing our solar panel technologies, wind energy, and photovoltaic glass, you'll be using 100% renewable and clean energy sources.

solution3.title: Innovation in Generation Systems
solution3.subtitle: Cutting-Edge Technologies
solution3.description: Green is a leader in offering innovative products, such as photovoltaic glass and solar tiles, that combine high-efficiency solar energy and incorporate it into building construction elements.

solution4.title: Increase Property Value
solution4.subtitle: Better Return on Investment (ROI)
solution4.description: Properties with renewable energy systems, such as solar panels, wind energy, or photovoltaic tiles, increase their value and attractiveness in the market, ensuring a higher and faster return on investment. Thanks to distributed energy, the guaranteed return on investment in the system is between 5 and 10 years.

solution5.title: Energy Independence
solution5.subtitle: Total Control Over Your Energy Consumption
solution5.description: With our solutions, you can reduce your dependence on electrical grids and produce your own energy for self-consumption or feed it back into the grid.

meta.title: BIPV Technologies
meta.description: Discover our Building Integrated Photovoltaic solutions that combine energy generation with modern architecture.

hero.title: Integrated Photovoltaic Solutions
hero.subtitle: Cutting-edge technology that combines renewable energy generation with modern architectural design for sustainable and efficient buildings.

whatIs.title: What is Photovoltaic Glass?
whatIs.description: Photovoltaic glass is an innovative solution that integrates energy generation technology directly into building glass structures. Through a photovoltaic layer, these glasses convert sunlight into electrical and thermal energy while providing additional thermal insulation, improving the building's energy efficiency.

advantage1.title: Solar Energy Generation
advantage1.description: Photovoltaic glass converts 16% of visible light radiation into electricity and 6% into thermal energy, contributing to the building's energy efficiency.

advantage2.title: Heat Reduction
advantage2.description: The vacuum chamber in these glasses helps reduce heat transfer to the building interior, improving thermal comfort.

advantage3.title: High Efficiency
advantage3.description: They outperform other photovoltaic technologies in terms of efficiency and performance, thanks to their advanced light absorption and passivation properties.

advantage4.title: Aesthetic and Functional Design
advantage4.description: They adapt to various architectural applications, from facades to windows and roofs, providing energy without compromising aesthetics.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Definition and Operation
howItWorks.description1: Photovoltaic glass works through a photovoltaic film layer that converts solar light radiation into electricity. This film is low in emissivity, which means it reflects infrared radiation and ultraviolet rays, protecting the building interior from excessive heat.
howItWorks.description2: The glass has a vacuum chamber that helps minimize heat entry, improving the building's thermal insulation. This process allows the photovoltaic glass to generate electricity while maintaining the thermal comfort of interior spaces.
howItWorks.description3: The photovoltaic glass panel, with a crystalline appearance, offers excellent visual quality and performance. The photovoltaic modules are modular and standardized, facilitating their integration into any construction project.

spec1.title: Panel Power
spec1.description: Power range between 50 W and 200 W.

spec2.title: Temperature Coefficient
spec2.description: -0.29% ÂºC. This ensures optimal performance even with temperature changes.

applications.title: Applications
applications.app1: Double laminated glass facades, triple laminated or insulating chamber glass (DVH).
applications.app2: Windows and other architectural elements seeking to maximize energy efficiency.

variety.title: Variety and Durability
variety.point1: Available in a wide range of colors, transparencies, and reflectances.
variety.point2: Standardized modular design with a lifespan of over 30 years.

whatIs.title: What is the Solar Tile?
whatIs.description: The Solar Tile is an innovative solution that combines the traditional aesthetics of tiles with solar energy generation. Designed to integrate perfectly into any roof, it offers an elegant and efficient alternative for renewable energy generation.

advantage1.title: Safety and Durability
advantage1.description: Class A fire resistance rating, hurricane resistance, and structural waterproofing.

advantage2.title: Durability
advantage2.description: Complies with mandatory certification standards for building materials and has a lifespan similar to buildings.

advantage3.title: Installation and Maintenance
advantage3.description: Penetration-free installation, modular design, and easy to replace.

advantage4.title: Compatibility and Cleaning
advantage4.description: Compatible with most metal tiles, self-cleaning, and unobstructed drainage.

whatIs.title: What is the Solar Roof Panel?
whatIs.description: The Solar Roof Panel is an innovative system designed to integrate perfectly into flat roofs, offering an efficient and aesthetically pleasing solar energy generation solution. Made with ultra-transparent tempered glass of 6+6 mm, this panel not only generates electricity but also adapts to the modern aesthetics of residential and commercial buildings.

advantage1.title: Aesthetics and Modern Design
advantage1.description: Perfect for flat roofs, the panel offers a discreet and elegant design with ultra-transparent tempered glass.

advantage2.title: Safety and Protection
advantage2.description: The panel has Class A fire protection, ensuring its safety and reliability.

advantage3.title: Optimal Transparency
advantage3.description: Allows atomized light transmission, with options of 10% and 18% light transmission, making it suitable for various applications and design needs.

advantage4.title: Durability
advantage4.description: This panel has an estimated lifespan of 30 years, providing reliable energy generation for several decades.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Definition and Operation
howItWorks.description1: The Solar Roof Panel converts sunlight into electrical energy through high-efficiency monocrystalline photovoltaic cells. These cells are integrated into a modular design that facilitates installation on flat roofs. As light hits the panel, the photovoltaic cells convert it into electricity, which can then be used to power various applications within the building.
howItWorks.description2: The panel is also designed to facilitate water drainage, preventing water accumulation on the roof and maintaining the efficiency and durability of the system.

spec1.title: Maximum Power per Module
spec1.description: 275 W, providing efficient energy generation capacity.

spec2.title: Modular Dimensions
spec2.description: 1635 x 1185 x 52.8 mm. These standardized measurements allow for faster installation and adaptation to different types of roofs.

spec3.title: Module Weight
spec3.description: 67 kg, an appropriate weight to ensure panel stability without being excessively heavy.

spec4.title: Cell Type
spec4.description: Monocrystalline cells offer greater efficiency in converting sunlight to electrical energy.

spec5.title: Generation Time
spec5.description: The panel has a durability of 30 years, ensuring a reliable long-term return on investment.

spec6.title: Water Drainage Design
spec6.description: Incorporated into the design to ensure that water drains properly and does not affect the performance of the solar system.

whatIs.title: What is the Portable Solar Panel?
whatIs.description: The Portable Solar Panel is an off-grid solar generation system, designed to be lightweight, flexible, and easy to transport and install. Ideal for small spaces, such as balconies, building facades, and patios, this panel converts sunlight into electrical energy, helping to reduce dependence on the electrical grid. The modular design allows for flexible integration in different spaces, providing high added value with excellent performance characteristics.

advantage1.title: Lightweight and Flexible
advantage1.description: Made with an optimized composite material, the panel is 60% lighter than other solar systems, maintaining the same energy generation capacity.

advantage2.title: Easy Installation and Transport
advantage2.description: Its portable design allows for quick and uncomplicated installation. It can be easily transported and mounted in places like balconies, patios, or facades.

advantage3.title: Performance in Low Irradiance
advantage3.description: Generates energy efficiently even in low light conditions, such as mornings, evenings, and cloudy days.

advantage4.title: Durability and Long Lifespan
advantage4.description: The panel has an appearance warranty of 8 to 10 years and an electrical performance lifespan of 25 years, ensuring a reliable and lasting return on investment.

advantage5.title: Customization
advantage5.description: Adapts to various scenarios, making it a versatile option for different types of homes and buildings.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Definition and Operation
howItWorks.description1: The Portable Solar Panel converts sunlight into electrical energy through a simple and efficient process. The system includes a microinverter and connectors, allowing the panel to be connected directly to the electrical grid or other energy storage devices. Its modular design of 1200 x 900 x 15 mm allows for easy integration in small spaces such as balconies and facades.
howItWorks.description2: The installation process is very simple:
howItWorks.step1: Secure the panel to the balcony structure using a fastening strap.
howItWorks.step2: Connect the microinverter to the solar panel.
howItWorks.step3: Connect the extension cable and plug it into the electrical grid or an energy storage system.
howItWorks.keyBenefit: Key Benefit: The panel is designed to maximize energy generation in low irradiance conditions, making it ideal for climates with partially cloudy skies or when sunlight is not as direct.

feature1.title: Panel Size
feature1.description: 1200 x 900 x 15 mm, an ideal size for applications on balconies and building facades.

feature2.title: Power
feature2.description: Efficient electrical energy generation capacity, especially at low irradiance.

feature3.title: Microinverter
feature3.description: Included to convert direct current (DC) to alternating current (AC), facilitating connection to the electrical grid.

feature4.title: Optimized Composite Material
feature4.description: 60% lighter than other solar systems, without compromising performance.

point2.title: Electrical Performance
point2.description: Up to 25 years, ensuring prolonged use without losing efficiency.

applications.title: Applications
applications.app3: Patios, Perimeter Walls, and Metal Fences or Railings.

contact.title: Interested in our photovoltaic solutions?
contact.description: Our team of experts is ready to advise you and offer you the best solution for your project.

meta.title: Bifacial TOPCon Solar Panels - Advanced Technology
meta.description: Discover our next-generation bifacial TOPCon solar panels with efficiency over 23% and N-type technology for maximum performance.

hero.title: Bifacial TOPCon Solar Panels
hero.description: Next-generation photovoltaic modules with N-type bifacial monocrystalline cells and TOPCon technology, designed to maximize energy generation in large-scale commercial and industrial projects.

technology.title: Bifacial TOPCon Technology
technology.subtitle: The evolution of photovoltaic technology that redefines efficiency and durability standards

whatIs.title: What is TOPCon technology?
whatIs.description1: TOPCon (Tunnel Oxide Passivated Contact) is an advanced N-type solar cell technology that uses an ultra-thin oxide layer to create a passivated contact that significantly reduces recombination losses.
whatIs.description2: This innovation enables efficiencies over 23% and annual degradation below 0.4%, compared to 0.7% of conventional P-type cells.

energyGeneration.title: Higher Energy Generation
energyGeneration.description: Up to 30% more energy compared to traditional monofacial panels thanks to bifacial capture and higher efficiency of N-type cells.

degradation.title: Lower Degradation
degradation.description: Annual degradation below 0.4% vs 0.7% of P-type cells, ensuring higher energy production throughout the system's lifespan.

thermal.title: Better Thermal Performance
thermal.description: Lower temperature coefficient (-0.30%/Â°C) enables better performance in hot climates compared to conventional technologies.

utilityScale.title: Utility-Scale Projects
utilityScale.description: Large-scale installations (+10MW) where efficiency and LCOE are critical. Ideal for solar farms with high irradiance and reflective surfaces.

industrial.title: Industrial Installations
industrial.description: Industrial and commercial complexes requiring high power density and maximum efficiency in limited spaces.

groundMounted.title: Optimized Ground-Mounted Systems
groundMounted.description: Ground installations with highly reflective surfaces (sand, snow, water) that maximize bifacial gain.

extreme.title: Extreme Environments
extreme.description: Superior resistance in adverse conditions: high humidity, salinity, extreme temperatures and snow loads.

cta.title: Ready to implement the most advanced technology?

meta.title: Wind Turbine - High Efficiency Wind Power Generator
meta.description: Discover our high-efficiency wind turbine, designed to maximize wind energy conversion into electricity with over 90% performance.

hero.title: WIND TURBINE
hero.description: High-efficiency horizontal axis wind generator for industrial, commercial, agricultural and public projects. Designed to maximize wind energy conversion into electricity with over 90% performance.

efficiency.title: High Energy Efficiency
efficiency.description: Over 90% wind energy to electricity conversion thanks to optimized design and advanced control system.

versatility.title: Environmental Versatility
versatility.description: Ideal for areas with moderate to strong winds, adapting to different climatic and topographic conditions.

durability.title: Extreme Durability
durability.description: Built with high-quality materials and IP54 protection, ensuring a lifespan of over 20 years.

safety.title: Comprehensive Safety System
safety.description: Equipped with automatic braking system and overspeed protection for safe operation.

cta.title: Ready to Power Your Project?
cta.description: Calculate the wind energy potential for your project or consult with our experts for a customized solution.
